question:
You have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six year old child. 
Write a letter to the parents. In your letter,
Explain why you would like the job
Give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ.
Say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia.
Write at lease 150 words.
text: I am writing in connection with an advertisement that I have seen in an Australian magazine. According to the description in the advertisement, I have to stay with a family for six months and need to take care of their six-year-old child.

I am interested in this job because it would give me an opportunity to get  experience which I will be able to add to my resume. Moreover, It will facilitate me to earn a decent amount of money which will help me pay off the mortgage.

Me, I will be a suitable candidate for this position as I used to work at a nursing home. Given the previous fact, I can not only take care of your child's diet but also act quickly in case of an emergency.
During my leisure time in Australia, I would love to explore scenic adventurous places such as beaches and hill stations.
Contact me if you need any further details. I am hoping that you would consider me in  view of my past experience.
